ingredients.ingredient: 1 ¼ cups warm water (100 to 110 degrees F/40 to 45 degrees C)
3 ½ cups all-purpose flour, or as needed - divided

cookingTips: Use warm water (not hot) to activate the yeast properly without killing it
Roll dough evenly to ensure all pita breads puff up consistently during baking
Bake at 475°F for about 5-7 minutes until puffed - the pocket forms during baking
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide me through the yeast activation and dough-rolling process to create pita breads that puff up perfectly with a pocket inside.
